title: Life's Blood
description: ** The PULSE Prequel book, MYSTERIOUS TEACHER, releasing Jan. 2016, is already in pre-production to becoming a Featured Film for Theatrical Release in 2017.**Just when her relationship with Stuart and Jaegar seemed complicated enough, there are more vampires in the peaceful wine country town of Rutherford. Amidst the growing danger to her and everyone she loves, a proposition is given to Kalina which would change her life forever.PULSE, was the Award-Winning Finalist in two categories - " Romance" and " Multicultural" of the 2011 International Book Awards, where Kailin Gow won first place overall in Fiction Horror, joining winners from St. Martin's Press, Simon & Shuster, Zondervan, and Random House. She joins other winners such as Desmond Tutu and Rick Warren in the 2011 International Book Awards.The PULSE Series(TM): Available NowLife's Blood (PULSE #2): Available NowBlood Burned (PULSE #3): Available NowBlue Blood (PULSE #4): Available NowThe PULSE Papers (PULSE #4.5): Available NowBlood Bond (PULSE #5): Available NowBlood Available NowBlood   Available NowBlood   Available NowRing of Available NowRelated Brotherhood of Blood (A PULSE Novel) - a novel about Octavius, The Greystone Brothers, and Octavius' army of vampire mercenaries - Available Now
author: Kailin Gow
